event.label: Label/title of the event
event.note: Fill in the date and location of the event inside the first description tag. Format as "Date, place" and tag as such using the "Tag Date" and "Tag Place" buttons on the ribon above. To identify the place, use the VIAF lookup primarely. If the location cannot be found there, use the Geocode or the CWRC lookups.
Use multiple description tags for a multi-paragraph extended description.
Scholar note optional - delete if none.

listBibl.bibl: Source of event description and/or note optional - delete list bibl if none; multiple sources-separate bibl tags; Use the "tag title" button to link the referenced resource to a title in the CWRC repository or the VIAF service.

note.note: To make the event more discoverable, please add at least one keyword; to add more than one keyword, additional term elements (separated by commas) should be created for each additional keyword.
